name: Zone (Ayet Zaidi)
description:
Zone, the game where you sling yourself around inside the interior of a heavily damaged eve ship, avoiding obstacles created by the damage. Race against time as you try fix the ship before it self-destructs with you still inside.

Zip around with your grapple hook using Q to attach and de-attach to and from surfaces, using left click to drag and pull yourself while grappled.

Design, Direction & Implementation Richard

Level Design Richard Boorman, Ayet Zaidi, Frederick Bajet, Jordan Fletcher & Yassin
